messages.content:
To take a backup of alert definitions that have been modified or customized:

1. Go to Admin > Config > Alerts > Manage Alert Definitions.
2. Select the folder which contains alert definitions you want to backup and click Export Selected Definitions.

No additional steps are required as the context does not provide information on how to export alerting contexts, which are mentioned in some previous versions of the text but are not relevant to this specific task.
